translation: There is no being on earth or in heaven among the gods that is liberated from the three qualities born of Nature.
commentary: 18.40 No not? That that? Is there is? on the earth on the earth? or or? Divi in heaven? among the gods? or or? Again again? Sattvam being? Prakritijaih born of Prakriti (matter)? Freed freed? that which? by these from these? Maybe may be? three from three? Gunaih by alities.Commentary The Gunas form the warp and woof of everything as threads do in the case of cloth.Here in the world of mortals or there
